articles.author: Darlene Superville, Seung Min Kim
articles.title: Trump says he's withdrawing the nomination of Musk associate Jared Isaacman to lead NASA - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump says he's withdrawing the nomination of tech billionaire Jared Isaacman, an associate of Trump adviser Elon Musk, to lead NASA. Trump said Saturday on his social media site that he made the decision after a "thorough review of prior ass…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump said he is withdrawing the nomination of tech billionaire Jared Isaacman, an associate of Trump adviser Elon Musk, to lead NASA, saying he reached the decision … [+2104 chars]
